TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StructureChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class StructureChangedEventArgs Inherits AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Contiene información sobre el evento que se genera cuando la estructura de árbol de automatización de la interfaz de usuario ha cambiado.

span.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

related.span: Información general sobre eventos de UI Automation
Suscribirse a eventos de UI Automation

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType structureChangeType, int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

param.name: structureChangeType
param.span: Valor único que especifica el tipo de cambio.

span.span: A single value that specifies the type of change.

param.name: runtimeId
param.span: El motor de tiempo de ejecución de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] del elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] cuya estructura ha cambiado.

span.span: The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase , que especifica el tipo de cambio y [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] del elemento cuya estructura ha cambiado.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the type of change and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los valores que pueden devolverse en `structureChangeType` dependen de la implementación del proveedor de automatización de interfaz de usuario.The values that can be returned in `structureChangeType` depend on the implementation of the UI Automation provider. Por ejemplo, cuando se agregan a o quita elementos de un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] cuadro de lista, si el proveedor no es capaz de determinar el número de elementos agregado o quitado, podría especificar y no o .For example, when items are added to or removed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list box, if the provider is not able to determine the number of items added or removed, it might specify and not or . En la tabla siguiente se describe la información del evento recibido por el para cambios en la estructura diferentes.The following table describes the information in the event received by the for different structure changes. |`structureChangeType`|Origen del eventoEvent source|`runtimeId`| |---------------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||Elemento secundario que se ha agregado.The child that was added.|Elemento secundario que se ha agregado.The child that was added.| ||El elemento primario del elemento secundario que se ha quitado.The parent of the child that was removed.|Elemento secundario que se ha eliminado.The child that was removed.| ||El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se han agregado.The parent of the children that were added.|El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se han agregado.The parent of the children that were added.| ||El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se quitaron.The parent of the children that were removed.|El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se quitaron.The parent of the children that were removed.| ||El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se invalidaron.The parent of the children that were invalidated.|El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se invalidaronThe parent of the children that were invalidated| Controles personalizados no pueden ser capaces de proporcionar un valor significativo en `runtimeId`.Custom controls might not be able to provide a meaningful value in `runtimeId`. Para obtener más información, vea .For more information, see . ## Examples El siguiente ejemplo muestra cómo construir y generar un evento cuando se agregan elementos secundarios a o quita de un cuadro de lista personalizado.The following example shows how to construct and raise an event when children are added to, or removed from, a custom list box. [!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: Recupera el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] en tiempo de ejecución de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] del elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] cuya estructura cambió.

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

returns.span: Identificador de tiempo de ejecución del elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] cuya estructura ha cambiado.

span.span: The runtime ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El valor devuelto puede ser el identificador del elemento secundario que se agregó o quitó o, en el caso de muchos elementos secundarios que se va a agregar, quitar o invalidado, el identificador del elemento primario.The return value may be the identifier of the child that was added or removed or, in the case of many children being added, removed, or invalidated, the identifier of the parent. Para obtener más información, vea .For more information, see . Controles personalizados podrían no proporcionar un identificador válido en tiempo de ejecución.Custom controls might not provide a valid runtime identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StructureChangeType As StructureChangeType

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtiene un valor que indica el tipo de cambio que se produjo en la estructura de árbol de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: Gets a value indicating the type of change that occurred in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure.

value.span: Tipo de cambio que se ha producido.

span.span: The type of changed that occurred.
